name: Jewel Quest Solitaire
description:
Back of Case - Nintendo DS (UK) (from Ad Blurbs)

Solitaire with a challenging twist!

Jewel Quest Solitaire takes you on an adventure through the South American Jungle matching cards, swapping jewels and discovering hidden secrets!

Featuring unique tri-peaks solitaire gameplay, you must match card suits to earn pieces for the Jewel board turning it to gold. Unearth buried cards, discover special moves and avoid cursed jewels to solve 114 all new card layouts. Riches and glory are in the cards, play them wisely or your journey could soon end!
  • 114 jewel-themed solitaire card decks
  • 684 possible card scenarios
  • Two game modes - play Full Quest Mode or Just Cards Mode
